mapper.select:
select d.bsc as bsc,t.cell,t.bspwrb,t.bspwrt, 'RLCPC:CELL='||t.cell||',BSPWRB='||t.bspwrb||',BSPWRT='||t.bspwrb||';' as command from rno_gsm_eri_cell t left join RNO_GSM_BSC_DATA d on d.id = t.bsc
where t.bspwrb <> t.bspwrt
and t.city_id = ${cityId}
and t.bsc in (${bscStr})
order by d.bsc

select * from( select d.BSC,cell,ch_group,hop, RNO_GET_FREQ_CNT(dchno_32) as dchno, dchno_32 as dch, 'RLCHC:CELL='||cell||',HOP=ON,CHGR='||ch_group||';' as command from rno_gsm_eri_cell_ch_group t left join RNO_GSM_BSC_DATA d on (d.ID = t.bsc) where t.hop = 'OFF'
and t.mea_date = to_date('${date1}', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
and t.city_id = ${cityId}
and t.bsc in (${bscStr}))
where dchno > 2

select bsc, cell, ch_group, hop, dchno, dch, command from (select d.bsc,cell,ch_group,rank() over(partition by cell order by ch_group desc) as chgr_rn,hop, RNO_GET_FREQ_CNT(dchno_32) as dchno,dchno_32 as dch, 'RLCHC:CELL=' || cell || ',HOP=ON,CHGR=' || ch_group || ';' as command from rno_gsm_eri_cell_ch_group t left join RNO_GSM_BSC_DATA d on (d.ID = t.bsc) where t.hop = 'OFF'
and t.mea_date = to_date('${date1}', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
and t.city_id = ${cityId}
and t.bsc in (${bscStr}))
where dchno > 2 and chgr_rn > 1

select d.bsc, cell.cell, length(cell.active_32 || ',') - nvl(length(REPLACE(cell.active_32, ',')), 0) AS active, length(cell.idle_32 || ',') - nvl(length(REPLACE(cell.idle_32, ',')), 0) AS idle from rno_gsm_eri_cell cell left join RNO_GSM_BSC_DATA d on (d.ID = cell.bsc) where
cell.mea_date = to_date('${date1}', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
and cell.city_id = ${cityId}
and cell.bsc in (${bscStr})

select cell.mea_date create_time, d.bsc, cell.cell, cell.maxta, cell.talim from rno_gsm_eri_cell cell left join RNO_GSM_BSC_DATA d on (d.ID = cell.bsc)
where cell.maxta < cell.talim
and cell.mea_date = to_date('${date1}', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
and cell.city_id = ${cityId}
and cell.bsc in (${bscStr})

select incell.bsc || '-' || incell.cell || '-' || decode(c.EN_NAME,null,'空',c.CELL_NAME)|| '-' || decode(c.LONGITUDE,null,'空',c.LONGITUDE)|| ',' || decode(c.latitude,null,'空',c.latitude) cell, incell.bsic, incell.bcch from (SELECT d.bsc, t.cell, t.BSIC, t.BCCH FROM (select distinct c1.bsc, c1.cell, c1.ncc || c1.bcc BSIC, C1.bcchno BCCH from rno_gsm_eri_cell c1, rno_gsm_eri_cell c2
where C1.cell <> C2.cell
and c1.bcchno = c2.bcchno and c1.ncc || c1.bcc = c2.ncc || c2.bcc
and c1.mea_date = to_date('${date1}', 'yyyy-MM-dd') and c2.mea_date = to_date('${date1}', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
and C1.CITY_ID = ${cityId} and C2.CITY_ID = ${cityId}
and c1.bsc in (${bscStr}) and c2.bsc in (${bscStr})
ORDER BY c1.bcchno, c1.ncc || c1.bcc) t left join RNO_GSM_BSC_DATA d on (d.ID = t.bsc) ) incell left join RNO_GSM_CELL c on c.EN_NAME = incell.cell

select bsc, cell, cellr, cellr_bsc, cs, 'RLNRC:CELL=' || cell || ',CELLR=' || cellr || ',CS=YES;' mml from (select substr(cell.cell, 0, 6) site, d.bsc, cell.n_cell cell, cell.cell cellr, cell.n_bsc cellr_bsc, cell.cs from rno_gsm_eri_ncell_param cell left join RNO_GSM_BSC_DATA d on (d.ID = cell.bsc) where
cell.mea_date = to_date('${date1}', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
and cell.city_id = ${cityId}
and cell.bsc in (${bscStr})
and substr(cell.cell, 0, 6) = substr(cell.n_cell, 0, 6) order by substr(cell.cell, 0, 6), cell.n_cell) A where not exists (select * from (select substr(cell.cell, 0, 6) site, d.bsc, cell.cell, cell.n_cell cellr, cell.n_bsc cellr_bsc, cell.cs from rno_gsm_eri_ncell_param cell left join RNO_GSM_BSC_DATA d on (d.ID = cell.bsc) where
cell.mea_date = to_date('${date1}', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
and cell.city_id = ${cityId}
and cell.bsc in (${bscStr})
and substr(cell.cell, 0, 6) = substr(cell.n_cell, 0, 6) order by substr(cell.cell, 0, 6), cell.cell) B where A.site = B.site and A.bsc = B.bsc and A.cell = B.cell and A.cellr = B.cellr and A.cellr_bsc = B.cellr_bsc and A.cs = B.cs)

select tt.bsc, tt.cell, tt.bcchno, tt.tch, tt2.n_cell, tt2.n_bcchno, tt2.n_tch, fun_rno_getdistance(tt.lng,tt.lat,tt2.n_lng,tt2.n_lat) as distance, case when substr(tt.cell, 0, 6) = substr(tt2.n_cell, 0, 6) then cast('YES' as varchar2(3)) else cast('NO' as varchar2(2)) end as cs from ( select t2.bsc,t2.bsc_id,t2.cell , t2.bcchno,t1.tch,t1.band,t1.lng,t1.lat from ( select g.cell, wm_concat(g.dchno_32) as tch, g.band, c.longitude as lng, c.latitude as lat from rno_gsm_eri_cell_ch_group g left join RNO_GSM_CELL c on (c.EN_NAME = g.cell) where
g.mea_date = to_date('${date1}', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
and g.city_id = ${cityId}
and g.bsc in (${bscStr})
group by g.cell,g.band,c.longitude,c.latitude) t1 left join ( select d.bsc,cell.bsc as bsc_id,cell.cell,cell.bcchno from rno_gsm_eri_cell cell left join RNO_GSM_BSC_DATA d on (d.ID = cell.bsc) where
cell.mea_date = to_date('${date1}', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
and cell.city_id = ${cityId}
and cell.bsc in (${bscStr}) ) t2 on (t1.cell = t2.cell) ) tt left join ( select t1.bsc as bsc_id, t1.cell, t1.n_cell, t2.bcchno as n_bcchno, t2.n_lng, t2.n_lat, t3.n_tch, t3.n_band from (select bsc,n_bsc, cell, n_cell from rno_gsm_eri_ncell_param where
mea_date = to_date('${date1}', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
and city_id = ${cityId}
and bsc in (${bscStr}) ) t1 left join (select d.bsc, cell.cell, cell.bcchno, c.longitude as n_lng, c.latitude as n_lat from rno_gsm_eri_cell cell left join RNO_GSM_BSC_DATA d on (d.ID = cell.bsc) left join RNO_GSM_CELL c on (c.EN_NAME = cell.cell) where
cell.mea_date = to_date('${date1}', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
and cell.city_id = ${cityId}
and cell.bsc in (${bscStr}) ) t2 on (t1.n_cell =t2.cell and t1.n_bsc = t2.bsc) left join (select cell,wm_concat(dchno_32) as n_tch,band as n_band from rno_gsm_eri_cell_ch_group where
mea_date = to_date('${date1}', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
and city_id = ${cityId}
and bsc in (${bscStr})
group by cell,band) t3 on (t1.n_cell = t3.cell)) tt2 on(tt.bsc_id = tt2.bsc_id and tt.cell = tt2.cell and tt.band = tt2.n_band)
